results.description: La Liga asks the Spanish Football Federation for permission to hold December's match between Atletico Madrid and Villarreal in Miami.
results.shortTitle: La Liga makes new Miami request
results.title: Atletico Madrid v Villarreal: La Liga submits request to hold fixture in Miami

results.description: Gareth Bale is sent off in stoppage time after scoring two goals to rescue a point for Real Madrid against Villarreal in La Liga.
results.shortTitle: Real's Bale sent off after scoring twice
results.title: Villarreal 2-2 Real Madrid: Gareth Bale sent off after scoring twice

results.description: Real Madrid travel to Villarreal in third La Liga game of the season
results.shortTitle: Bale scores twice and is then sent off as Villarreal hold Real
results.title: La Liga: Villarreal 1-1 Real Madrid

results.description: Fulham midfielder Andre-Frank Zambo Anguissa joins Spanish La Liga side Villarreal on a season-long loan deal.
results.title: Andre-Frank Zambo Anguissa: Villarreal sign Fulham midfielder on loan

thumbnail.altText: Andre-Frank Zambo Anguissa in action for Fulham

results.description: Villarreal sign former Liverpool defender Alberto Moreno on a free transfer.

results.description: West Ham sign Spain forward Pablo Fornals for £24m from La Liga side Villarreal on a five-year contract.

results.title: Pablo Fornals: West Ham sign Spain forward for £24m

results.description: Villarreal's Samuel Chukwueze will have to choose whether to play for Nigeria at the Under-20 World Cup or the Africa Cup of Nations.
results.title: Samuel Chukwueze: Villarreal winger facing Nigeria dilemma

results.description: Mariano Diaz scores twice as Real Madrid beat Villarreal in an entertaining La Liga game.
results.shortTitle: Mariano double as Real beat Villarreal
results.title: Mariano double as Real Madrid beat Villarreal 3-2

results.description: Real Madrid host Villarreal in La Liga - follow live text commentary.
results.shortTitle: Real Madrid v Villarreal - Mariano scores twice

results.description: Eintracht Frankfurt, who trailed 4-1 in the first leg, defeat Benfica on away goals to set up a Europa League semi-final with Chelsea.
results.shortTitle: From 4-1 down to Europa League semi-final
results.title: From 4-1 down to Europa League semi-final - Frankfurt advance after thrilling tie

thumbnail.altText: Eintracht Frankfurt players celebrate beating Benfica in the Europa League

results.description: La Liga leaders Barcelona score two late goals to draw 4-4 with Villarreal in a remarkable game.
results.title: Barcelona battle back for 4-4 draw at Villarreal

results.description: Spanish champions Barcelona visit struggling Villarreal, while Italian leaders Juventus travel to Cagliari - follow live text commentary.
results.title: Barcelona rescue draw in Villarreal thriller

results.description: Samuel Chukwueze says that wining the Nigeria Football Federation's Young Player award will keep him motivated for the future.
results.shortTitle: Chukwueze beats Osimhen, Onyekuru to award
results.title: 'Motivated' Samuel Chukwueze wins award ahead of Osimhen and Onyekuru

results.description: Alvaro Morata scores his first Atletico Madrid goal as they beat Villarreal to move back to within seven points of Barcelona.
results.shortTitle: Morata scores as Atletico beat Villarreal
results.title: Atletico Madrid 2-0 Villarreal: Alvaro Morata scores as Diego Simeone's side win

results.description: Lautaro Martinez's first-half penalty secures a narrow first-leg win for Inter Milan away at Rapid Vienna in the Europa League last 32.
results.shortTitle: Inter win away - Europa League round-up
results.title: Rapid Vienna 0-1 Inter Milan in Europa League: Martinez seals narrow win

results.description: Villarreal sack manager Luis Garcia, just 49 days after he was appointed.
results.shortTitle: Villarreal sack Garcia after nine games
results.title: Villarreal sack Luis Garcia after just nine games

results.description: Leicester midfielder Vicente Iborra joins Villarreal for an undisclosed fee.
results.title: Vicente Iborra: Leicester midfielder moves to Villarreal for undisclosed fee

results.description: Santi Cazorla scores twice as Villarreal denied Real Madrid a chance to reduce the gap to La Liga leaders Barcelona to five points.
results.title: Villarreal 2-2 Real Madrid: Santi Cazorla double frustrates Solari's men

results.description: Barcelona move above Sevilla to go top of La Liga as goals from Gerard Pique and Carles Alena see off struggling Villarreal.
results.shortTitle: Barcelona beat Villarreal to go top
results.title: Barcelona 2-0 Villarreal: Gerard Pique and Carles Alena send champions top
